data.actual_result: The ID/Secret gets copied, but the page jumps
data.expected_result: The ID/Secret is supposed to get copied without any such jump
data.short_description: [Edge] In any of your applications, clicking "Copy" makes the whole page jump
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to My Applications (https://discordapp/(dot)com/developers/applications/me) - Choose any app - Go to General Information - Try clicking "Copy" for either Client ID or Client Secret - Observe the page jump
